short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web highlighter to support reading on web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ‰ Need a AI sidekick to help you spot the good stuff on web pages? Look no further! Our GPT Web Highlighter is here to be your trusty buddy in the web browsing adventure! 

ğŸ‰ Modes of Mayhem:
  â­ï¸Off Mode: When you need a break, turn off the highlighter and give your eyes a rest. We won't judge; even superheroes need their downtime.

  â­ï¸Automatic Mode: It's like having a cheeky sidekick! Let our genius algorithm do the detective work and highlight the good stuff automatically. Sit back and enjoy the show.
